message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be a valuable asset for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $20,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
